title: karpakamE aruL porpadamE
sahitya:
karpakamE aruL porpadamE nAn arpanAyinum un anbanallavO mayilai


anupallavi

  karpanaigal kaDanda kAlamumAgi ninra arputamE muppurattu azhagi enrE vanda


caraNam    sharavaNabhavanukku vEl koDuttAi perum karimukhattavanukku kani koDuttAi
haranukku viDam taDuttu uyir koDuttAi tIya arakkarai azhittulagil sukham koDuttAi
drAviDa mazhalaikkun pAl koDuttAi guruparanukkun maNImAlai tandAi
karam eDuttE vazhangum tiran irukkaiyil inda siriyEnukkun aruL siridEnum tArAyO
